participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, Emily enjoys exploring the world through her camera lens. She is passionate about teaching and connecting with her students.
participant_1.background: i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and laid-back, Michael enjoys indulging in his favorite foods and taking leisurely strolls. He values simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i live in a house.
